name: DISCONTINUED WhatsApp-Web - Dark Skin by HetorusNL
additional_info:
DISCONTINUED
After the immense amount of updates the whatsapp guys implemented on the website, this style is discontinued.
The best style to use (and I am also using myself) is:
Dark/Transparent Whatsapp [+ 10 fonts]
https://userstyles.org/styles/137361/dark-transparent-whatsapp-10-fonts

v0.18
Quick fix after last (huge) WA update

v0.17
Fixed restoring the ugly message background color to black (#1b1b1b) after the last update

v0.16
Fixed the search bar and the top bars with CHATS / MESSAGES when searching using the search bar.

v0.15
Fixed all the broken stuff from last web whatsapp update.

v0.14
Fixed broken group chat participant colors and rewritten duration/timestamp style and emojitext style.

v0.13
Fixed blue ticks to be blue once again!
Website previews have correct background-color again

v0.12
Fixed all elements that the recent version of WhatsApp broke in this style.
Note, this recent update of WhatsApp breaks the blue ticks in chats, read and unread are all gray.
... working on it ...

v0.11
Fixed colors of last seen of private chats and colors of members of group chats.
Fixed background color of date messages (TODAY, YESTERDAY, etc).
Fixed color of group chat system messages ("participant1 removed participant2", "participant3 left", etc)

v0.10
Fixed colored contact names of group chat participants were all white since last whatsapp update.

v0.9
Fixed background color of pdf (and possibly other) documents, sent via whatsapp.

v0.8
Fixed color and alignment of message info pane in group chats (individual chats were probably already correct).
Removed margin of chatlist pane to increase message size that is previewed for the chats.

v0.7
Fixed color of "Add a caption ..." text and the real caption text when an image or other item is  shared.

v0.6
Fixed borders and hover over chats in left pane.
Fixed colors in right click in chats pane after WhatsApp changed class names.

v0.5
Fixed colors when group admin to add participants or invite to group via link.

v0.4
Fixed colors when replying to a message.

v0.3
Modified the theme for the recent changes from WhatsApp regarding input boxes and system messages like end-to-end encryption and date (floating boxes).
More pages are colored correctly like: contact-info, search in chat, search in everything, new-chat box.

v0.2
Modified style for use with firefox

v0.1
WhatsApp-Web - Dark Skin by HetorusNL
Edited from: WA-Web - Dark Skin [WITH MORE CONTRAST]
